validations.mustTargetSomething: [Message indicating that 'source' and 'org' flags cannot both be null]
validations.mustSpecifyOutput: [Message indicating that 'format' and 'outfile' cannot both be null]
validations.outfileMustBeValid: [Message indicating that 'outfile' must be a well-formed filepath]
validations.outfileMustBeSupportedType: [Message indicating that 'outfile' must be a supported file format]

output.noViolationsDetected: [Message indicating that no violations were found]
